Description: Fragment of rim and upper wall of an Attic pottery bell-krater; traces of handle attachment. Interior glazed with reserved bands at lip and near bottom of sherd; exterior glazedsave for reserved band below offset of lip at left of sherd. Incised inscription on top of rim.
Bibliographic references: Edgar 1898/1899 / Excavations at Naukratis. B: The Inscribed and Painted Pottery (no. 105)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 704, no. 628)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1074)
